import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import { every } from "./API/contact"; const Edit=()=>{ const[obj,setObj]=useState({ fullname:"", contact:0, commercials:0, experience:0, expert:"" }) const{id}=useParams(id) useEffect(()=>{ loadExpert() }) const loadExpert=async(id)=>{ alert(id) const exp=await every(id) setObj(exp.data) } return( <>
); } export default Edit;
